group_1.narration: Where did you hear? Did you hear it all?@The Rumor of the Valentine's Monster Buster!
You already know about the rumor of the@Valentine's Monster? You do, don't you?@It comes if ya give chocolate out at school!
But there's another rumor to go with it.@An ally to all maidens!@The Valentine's Monster Buster!
It chases away the Valentine's Monster@to cheer on your love!
Hand over your chocolates without fear!

group_1.textRight: The name seems a bit long...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, you're rightâ€¦
But I think it's important to make it simple@enough to tell what it's about.
Yeah, I guess it would be better to keep it@long if it's easy to understand...
How about the rest? Is it okay?

group_1.textRight: That last whistling bit... It seems kind@of cheesy?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100901:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]I came up with that part...

group_1.textRight: Speaking of, I think the first one you made@up, where it has that sign-off...
That's kinda cheesy, too. Is that just how @you write, Rena?

group_1.textLeft: Kaede! [chara:100901:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100901:cheek_0][chara:100901:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:100901:lipSynch_1]Normally I wouldn't let that @slide...
[chara:100901:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]But I guess I'm not really in a position@where I can get mad...

group_1.textRight: I can't believe you made your own [textBlue:rumor]!

group_1.textLeft: I'm sorry...

group_1.textRight: But you made it out of the goodness of your@heart. [chara:101101:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:101101:cheek_0][chara:101101:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:101101:lipSynch_1]Hee hee.

group_1.textLeft: More like outta the emptiness of my head...

group_1.textRight: Anyway, putting your lame gossip skills @aside.
If we can get this rumor spread far enough,@the earlier one'll lose effectiveness, yeah?

group_1.textLeft: Yep. Thanks, Momoko...
I'll get to spreading it around now!

group_1.narration: About the Valentine's Monster Buster rumor!
But, ya know...@Don't you think it makes the Valentine's@Monster one kind of pointless?
If a Buster comes out too, it just gets@confusing!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, the Valentine's Buster? Yeah, I heard@about it.
To be honest, I think the Monster rumor is @way more interesting.

group_1.textRight: Pass out some candy at school, game over!@The rumor's better if it cuts off there.

group_1.textLeft: Totally!

group_1.textRight: It looks like people aren't big fans of the@follow-up...

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I'm still hearing the monster story@every once in a while...
But the Buster rumor didn't stick at all.
Well, the first one has a stronger impact.
Whereas the second one...
It kinda feels like it's just piggybacking@on the first one.
Hm, that's a tough one...
I don't think there's anything more we can@do, now.
But hey!
I actually feel like it's gonna be okay.
